structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.catch_line: Purposes for issuance of bonds -- Principal amount maximum.

text.section: The principal amount of the bonds issued may not exceed the amount required for subsections (1)(a) to (e) of this section, plus financing costs, permitted by this chapter to be paid from the proceeds of bonds, plus, in the case of judgments, costs, and expenses assessed or taxed against the issue and defense costs of the issuer.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1996.
